entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:23 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 11:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -37.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.6°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:32 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:32 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
